description:
"4xBit extensively uses the world's leading technology- Blockchain to initiate and maintain its digital funds. The fact that it allows digital information to be shared or distributed but never copied makes it one of the safest mediums for cryptocurrency usage.

With a total supply of 75,000,000 4xBit coins, their main purpose is to engage in and offer efficient digital money investment opportunities, trading options, and market competition all under one roof. Incorporated as an individual organization, MyBtcFx is determined by creating an astound base for potentially interested investors, traders and more.

The 4xBit Coin would serve myriad purposes of use for gambling, online & offline games especially VR games, trading, and investments. Acting as a platform to house the valuable MyBtcFx digital finance, this will be acknowledged as a dominant stage to support efficient cryptocurrency transaction."
name: 4xBit
